content: "{\"object\":\"value\",\"document\":{\"object\":\"document\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Polish version available here:\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"attachment\",\"data\":{\"size\":52223,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/4e2b621f-4843-4894-96b7-1b39be53a698/Poland - Polish - Company Polsource Contractors Privacy Notice.docx\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/4e2b621f-4843-4894-96b7-1b39be53a698/Poland - Polish - Company Polsource Contractors Privacy Notice.docx\",\"fileName\":\"Poland - Polish - Company Polsource Contractors Privacy Notice.docx\",\"name\":\"Poland - Polish - Company Polsource Contractors Privacy Notice.docx\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"application\",\"subtype\":\"vnd.openxmlformats-officedocument.wordprocessingml.document\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"wildcardType\":false,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"concrete\":true,\"charset\":null},\"type\":\"attachment\",\"id\":\"4e2b621f-4843-4894-96b7-1b39be53a698\",\"extension\":\"docx\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Polsource spółka z ograniczoną odpowiedzialnością \",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"with its registered address is ul. Dworska 1A/LU4, 30-314 Kraków, Poland (\",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"“The Company”\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\") now part of EPAM Systems, Inc. and the EPAM Group of Companies (\",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\\"EPAM\\\"\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\") is committed to protecting the privacy and security of your personal information.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"This privacy notice describes how we collect and use personal information about you when you are providing services to the Company, in accordance with the General Data Protection Regulation 2016 (“GDPR”). \\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"You are receiving this privacy notice because you will be providing services to the Company as an independent contractor, as a member of the personnel of our service provider or as an individual cooperating with the Company on the basis of a civil law agreement, training or apprenticeship agreement. This is separate to any privacy notice you have already received about any recruitment or application process or the general privacy notice for general use of our corporate websites. \\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"We may update this notice at any time.  Where we can, we will notify applicants of substantial changes to the privacy notice.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"The Company is a \\\"data controller\\\". This means that we are responsible for deciding how we hold and use personal information about you. \\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"We are required under data protection legislation to notify you of the information contained in this privacy notice. It is important that you read this notice so that you are aware of how and why we use your personal data. \\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}}"
